definition: of a young bird, having acquired its flight feathers, young bird that has just fledged or become capable of flying
details:
adjective
- of a young bird, having acquired its flight feathers
= example: of a young bird, having acquired its flight feathers
= synonyms: fledgling
noun
- young bird that has just fledged or become capable of flying
= synonyms: fledgling
- any new participant in some activity
= synonyms: starter
